statements: SELECT * FROM drinks;
SELECT drink_id, drink_name, ingredient_id FROM drinks;
SELECT * FROM drinks WHERE drink_id = 1;
SELECT drink_name, quantity, instructions FROM drinks;
SELECT * FROM drinks ORDER BY drink_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM drinks WHERE drink_name='Mojito';
SELECT drink_id, quantity FROM drinks WHERE ingredient_id=2 ORDER BY drink_id DESC;
SELECT drink_name, instructions FROM drinks WHERE quantity='Large' AND ingredient_id IN (1,3);
SELECT * FROM drinks ORDER BY drink_id ASC, ingredient_id DESC;
SELECT drink_id, ingredient_id, quantity FROM drinks WHERE drink_name LIKE '%Colada%';
SELECT cocktail_id, cocktail_name, instructions FROM cocktail_recipes WHERE cocktail_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM ingredients WHERE ingredient_name LIKE '%vodka%';
SELECT ingredient_id, ingredient_name, quantity FROM ingredients ORDER BY ingredient_id DESC;
SELECT cocktail_name FROM cocktail_recipes WHERE instructions IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM cocktail_recipes WHERE cocktail_name = 'Margarita';
SELECT cocktail_name, instructions FROM cocktail_recipes WHERE cocktail_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM cocktail_recipes WHERE cocktail_id > 5 ORDER BY cocktail_name DESC;
SELECT cocktail_name, instructions, ingredient_name FROM cocktail_recipes JOIN ingredients ON cocktail_recipes.cocktail_id = ingredients.ingredient_id;
SELECT cocktail_name AS name, instructions AS steps FROM cocktail_recipes WHERE instructions LIKE '%mix%' ORDER BY cocktail_name;
SELECT cocktail_name, quantity FROM cocktail_recipes JOIN ingredients ON cocktail_recipes.cocktail_id = ingredients.ingredient_id WHERE quantity > 2 ORDER BY cocktail_name;
SELECT * FROM drinks;
SELECT drink_name, drink_category FROM drinks WHERE drink_category = 'Cocktail';
SELECT drink_id, drink_name, instructions FROM drinks WHERE drink_category = 'Beer' ORDER BY drink_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM ingredients WHERE ingredient_type = 'Fruit' ORDER BY ingredient_name DESC;

SELECT cocktail_id, drink_name, ingredient_name, quantity FROM cocktail_recipe JOIN drinks ON cocktail_recipe.drink_id = drinks.drink_id JOIN ingredients ON cocktail_recipe.ingredient_id = ingredients.ingredient_id;
SELECT * FROM drinks;
SELECT drink_name, drink_category FROM drinks WHERE drink_category = 'Cocktail';

SELECT d.drink_name, i.ingredient_name, cr.quantity FROM drinks d JOIN cocktail_recipe cr ON d.drink_id = cr.drink_id JOIN ingredients i ON cr.ingredient_id = i.ingredient_id WHERE d.drink_category = 'Cocktail';

SELECT d.drink_name, i.ingredient_name, cr.quantity FROM drinks d JOIN cocktail_recipe cr ON d.drink_id = cr.drink_id JOIN ingredients i ON cr.ingredient_id = i.ingredient_id WHERE i.ingredient_type = 'Alcohol' ORDER BY d.drink_name ASC;

SELECT d.drink_name, i.ingredient_name, cr.quantity FROM drinks d JOIN cocktail_recipe cr ON d.drink_id = cr.drink_id JOIN ingredients i ON cr.ingredient_id = i.ingredient_id WHERE i.ingredient_type = 'Non-Alcohol' ORDER BY i.ingredient_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM Recipes;
SELECT recipe_name, instructions FROM Recipes WHERE recipe_id = 1;
SELECT cocktail_name FROM Cocktails WHERE recipe_id = 3;

SELECT cocktail_name, ingredient_name, quantity FROM Cocktails INNER JOIN CocktailIngredients ON Cocktails.cocktail_id = CocktailIngredients.cocktail_id INNER JOIN Ingredients ON CocktailIngredients.ingredient_id = Ingredients.ingredient_id;
SELECT DISTINCT recipe_name, instructions FROM Recipes;
SELECT * FROM Recipes WHERE recipe_id = 1;
SELECT recipe_name, instructions FROM Recipes ORDER BY recipe_name ASC;
SELECT cocktail_name, quantity FROM Cocktails JOIN CocktailIngredients ON Cocktails.cocktail_id = CocktailIngredients.cocktail_id WHERE cocktail_id = 1;
SELECT ingredient_name, quantity FROM Ingredients LEFT JOIN CocktailIngredients ON Ingredients.ingredient_id = CocktailIngredients.ingredient_id;
SELECT recipe_name, COUNT(recipe_id) FROM Recipes GROUP BY recipe_name HAVING COUNT(recipe_id) > 1;
SELECT * FROM recipes;
SELECT recipe_name, ingredients FROM recipes;
SELECT cocktail_name, recipe_id FROM cocktails ORDER BY cocktail_id DESC;
SELECT user_name, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT cocktail_name, rating FROM cocktails JOIN ratings ON cocktails.cocktail_id = ratings.cocktail_id WHERE rating > 3;
SELECT * FROM recipes WHERE recipe_id = 1
SELECT recipe_name, instructions FROM recipes WHERE recipe_id = 2
SELECT cocktail_name, recipe_name FROM cocktails INNER JOIN recipes ON cocktails.recipe_id = recipes.recipe_id
SELECT user_name, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 3
SELECT rating FROM ratings WHERE cocktail_id = 4 AND user_id = 1
